ygData.subject: Re: I'm getting married!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... My political side wanted to do just that.  However this wedding isn t politically motivated.  I feel that what Duna and I are most comfortable with is
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 1 Nov 1999, David Lari wrote:
> Are you planning on announcing this on any of the poplular EQ web sites? It
> wouldn't be the first same-sex wedding you know.

My political side wanted to do just that. However this wedding isn't
politically motivated. I feel that what Duna and I are most comfortable
with is being open that we're getting married, and inviting friends. I
will expect a system broadcast to the server once the ceremony is
complete.

- Christina
